column2:
"Alright, let's resume, shall we? I want to talk
about requests I have for the two of you."

"I want to grow the military strength of ARKS as a whole.
For that, training new recruits will be indispensible."
"Aina, you will be in charge of training them."

"Me? Training recruits?
There's no way I could..."
"I don't think it is. Aina has plenty of real experience."

"Of course, I'll be supporting her along the way.
I'd like you to give it a try, Aina."
"L-Let me think about it for a bit..."
"As for what I'll be requesting of you..."
"A scouting party is calling for backup!"
"O-Oh no! Their vital signs are vanishing one by one!"
"Understood. Bruder, can I have you handle this?"
